nodes.text: A ship cutter was a device used by the Scrapper Guild on Bracca to break apart the wreckage of scrapped starships in the Shipbreaking Yard. They fired a slicing beam which was capable of going through a warship's armor. When the wing of a Venator-class Star Destroyer was cut away, it was suspended by other craft while a ship cutter spliced all the way through. The cutters were also used by the New Republic at the Nadiri Dockyards to disassemble captured Imperial Star Destroyers.
The ship cutter first appeared in the 2019 video game Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order.
